text:
A new video, showing alleged outsiders raising anti-India slogans at a February 9 event in JNU, has given a fresh twist to the case even as police informed the Delhi High Court about presence of some “foreign elements” at the gathering.

The youths, whose faces appear covered, are seen raising slogans against India and the police said it was examining the authenticity of the video.

Umar Khalid, who surrendered to police on Tuesday night, is visible in the video but is not seen raising slogans. — PTI
title: Fresh video shows ‘outsiders’
